description.narrative: To build capacity of national stakeholders, specially NGOs in making use of appropriate tools and technologies to better manage and present aid data using IATI format 2. To maintain and update Nepal Aid website (www.nepalaid.net) with relevant features, resources and content to to reflect on activities and initiatives around Aid Transparency in Nepal. 3. Mobilize local technical community to develop appropriate visualization tools to better present aid data 4. Initiate a small pilot open data initiative to make government spending and foreign aid on a specific thematic area (eg. Water and sanitation) available to general public in coordination with relevant stakeholders. 5. Disseminate information on how different tools and technologies can help organizations achieve better aid transparency.
To help national stakeholders working towards aid transparency in Nepal make use of appropriate tools and technologies for enhanced efficiency and effectiveness in their initiatives

participating-org.narrative: aidinfo Programme - Development Initiatives Poverty Research

mailing-address.narrative: YoungInnovations Pvt. Ltd. GPO 8976 CPC 241 Jawalakhel, Lalitpur, Nepal

description.narrative: Funds Received in once single tranche for activities to be carried out as per the approved proposal
